descr.p: "It's Only Make Believe" is a song written by Jack Nance and Conway Twitty, released by Twitty as a single in 1958. The single topped both U.S. and British national charts, and was Twitty's only number-one single on the pop charts of either country.

The song's lyrics describe the thoughts and feelings of a man in love with a woman who does not seem to be in love with him. He hopes and prays that, at some point in the future, the woman will be able to return his love, but laments that, at present, "it's only make believe."

Billy Fury had a UK #10 hit with his version in 1964, which also went to #1 in Singapore. Glen Campbell's 1970 recording became a top ten hit in both the United States and United Kingdom. Ronnie McDowell had a #8 single on the Billboard country chart in 1988 after recording the song as a duet with Twitty. The horror punk band Misfits have a cover version on their album Project 1950, titled "Only Make Believe".
